thread.title: Exporting models from maya7.0 into D3...

post.author: Carnifexx
post.body: I just found this link here http://www.doom3world.org/phpbb2/viewtopic.php?t=15371 and, being completely new to exporting from maya to D3, I was just wondering exactly how do you run this program? If simple directions had been included with the download then I wouldn't be posting right now but there wasn't so I am. Yes I've already been to iddevnet and I've read several pages on this site but unless you already have some experience with these things, you wont know what to do. Go ahead and flame me or something for creating a new topic on this but at least please respond with an answer.

post.author: Rayne
post.body: hey take it easy man! No one is going to kill you.. What is your problem exactly? Strange errors? Something like that...

post.author: Carnifexx
post.body: No no nothing like that...my problem is that when I try to use the program my comp doesn't know how to open it, so it can't. I know it has to be a mistake on my part, so I was wondering what are the steps I have to go through in order to actually export a model from maya to D3?

post.author: Rayne
post.body:
Carnifexx wrote:
No no nothing like that...my problem is that when I try to use the program my comp doesn't know how to open it, so it can't. I know it has to be a mistake on my part, so I was wondering what are the steps I have to go through in order to actually export a model from maya to D3?


1) What is the program that "your comp doesn't know how to open it"?

2) You can find a really simple explanation of the process in the thread you posted above

http://www.doom3world.org/phpbb2/viewto ... 037#140037

So, do you have a model? is it rigged?
